metadata.title: CVE-2024-36880 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: add missing firmware sanity checks Add the missing sanitychecks when parsing the firmware files before downloading them to avoidaccessing and corrupting memory beyond the vmalloced buffer.
